articles.title: T20 World Cup: The toxic trolling of India's cricket stars - BBC News
articles.description: As online abuse becomes the main form of venting, many worry about the toxicity cricketers face on social media.
articles.content:
By Zoya MateenBBC News, Delhi
Image source, Getty Images
Image caption, India's defeat against Pakistan in the T20 World Cup has sparked a wave of online abuse against cricketers

articles.title: T20 World Cup, WI vs BAN: West Indies Edge Past Bangladesh To Keep Semifinal Hopes Alive | Cricket News - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: T20 World Cup, WI vs BAN: West Indies kept their semifinal hopes alive as they sealed a narrow three-run victory against Bangladesh on Friday.
articles.content: Defending champions West Indies kept alive their slender hopes of making the semifinals while virtually knocking Bangladesh out of the T20 World Cup with a narrow three-run win on Friday. Asked to se… [+3358 chars]
